summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing a supplemental agreement in the amount of Seventeen Thousand Four Hundred Ninety Eight Dollars ($17,498) with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for additional financial assistance through the School-Based Partnerships Program to enhance the Seattle Police Department's current school-based partnership project at Garfield High School and to extend the original grant period; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation, and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
